title: Diamond Resorts -- Vacations for Life -- Mystic Dunes Resort & Golf Club Combines Fitness and Fun
text:
August 31, 2015 07:40 ET Diamond Resorts -- Vacations for Life -- Mystic Dunes Resort & Golf Club Combines Fitness and Fun 
L AS VEGAS, NV --(Marketwired - August 31, 2015) - Florida's city of Orlando is known for its impressive array of entertainment options, including world-renowned theme parks like Disney World, Universal Orlando, and SeaWorld. To give guests a chance to catch a break after an exciting day filled with wild rides and exciting shows, Diamond Resorts International® Mystic Dunes Resort & Golf Club offers them a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle with spacious 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom villas that make the hotel feel like home. Built on 600 acres of rolling hills with lush tropical landscaping, the resort's close proximity to all the attractions, shopping, and dining options makes it an ideal location for a "home base" from which to enjoy the city, including complementary shuttle transportation to the theme parks. 
Mystic Dunes Resort & Golf Club is much more than just a hotel -- it is an experience in itself. The golf course on the premise is one of the most renowned in Florida -- a 7,012-yard championship course that was awarded 4½ stars by Golf Digest. While serious golfers can work on their handicap, kids and families can play together at the adjacent 18-hole miniature golf course, just one of many activities that keep resort guests entertained: Four refreshing pools, including the Dune Lagoon with a two-story water slide, and private poolside cabanas create an engaging waterland that make the resort an excellent choice for family vacations. To ensure parents can vacation too, Diamond Resorts International® has scheduled engaging supervised children's activities to keep kids busy while mom and dad relax. Tennis and basketball courts are also available, and bicycles may be rented for exploring the area. 
The resort offers a range of dining options: Kenzie's, located in the Mystic Dunes Clubhouse, serves a variety of freshly prepared dishes along with breathtaking panoramic views. Efficient, easy room service is available, of course, and in keeping with the home-style atmosphere, the hotel staff can bring a selection of groceries to let guests privately dine in their villas. Mystic Dunes Resort & Golf Club is also a perfect location for a memorable wedding, corporate meeting or other special event. The versatile 3,300-square foot clubhouse features a beautiful ballroom and a picturesque outdoor patio. The resort's team of event professionals is skilled at taking care of every detail, including catering, A-V services, and decoration for any type of event. It is just one more way that Diamond Resorts International® guarantees that visitors will Stay Vacationed™. 
About Diamond Resorts International® Diamond Resorts International®, with its network of more than 330 vacation destinations located in 34 countries throughout the continental United States, Hawaii, Canada, Mexico, the Caribbean, South America, Central America, Europe, Asia, Australasia and Africa, provides guests with choice and flexibility to let them create their dream vacation, whether they are traveling an hour away or around the world. Our relaxing vacations have the power to give guests an increased sense of happiness and satisfaction in their lives, while feeling healthier and more fulfilled in their relationships, by enjoying memorable and meaningful experiences that let them Stay Vacationed™. 
Diamond Resorts International® manages vacation ownership resorts and sells vacation ownership points that provide members and owners with Vacations for Life ® at over 330 managed and affiliated properties and cruise itineraries. 
To learn more, visit: https://www.diamondresorts.com/Mystic-Dunes-Resort-and-Golf-Club
